title: Acts of the Apostles
creator_credit: Roberto Rossellini and Don Bosco Multimedia
brief_description: This is a special catechetical edition of the film, running for almost 6 hours, and telling the story of the trials and tribulations of the Apostles of Jesus Christ from the immediate time after his crucifiction until the acceptance of the new religion of Christianity. The film is divided into 10 parts, the titles for the parts are: ‘Gift of the spirit: good news people’, ‘Jesus lives in his people’, ‘Witness to Jesus’, ‘Conversion and rebirth’, Salvation is open to all’, ‘Spreading the good news’, ‘A Tried faith’, ‘Sharing truth and love’, ‘People of the beatitudes’, ‘The Church: a unity of churches’. The film is dubbed in English.
